SOMETIMES IN LIFE

You should just buy a one way ticket and enjoy the ride.

Storytime

January 15, 2017 | Pattaya | Thailand

  • SHARE:
  • FOLLOW:
This is our very first short story we created. It's the start of our journey, where we've left the Netherlands (our home country). Our first stop is Thailand. In Thailand, we start exploring with film making, editing and doing creative work abroad. We explore countries and peoples stories involving culture & arts, food & drinks and entrepreneurship.

Let us know what you think about our first movie in the comments below.
